message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value that represents the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay or recover during this reporting period.

Looking at the financial statements provided:

1. In the balance sheet, I can see "Taxes Payable" with an end amount of 42584.04 as of 2024-02-04.

2. In the cash flow statement, there's "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" with an amount of 42584.04.

3. Most importantly, in the income statement, I can see "Tax Expense" with an amount of 42584.04 for 2024-02-04.

The tax expense line item in the income statement specifically represents the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay during the reporting period. This is the value I need to extract.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '42584.04'} }
```
